column1: • Participating in Scrum calls to get the requirements and providing the updates.
• Creating Storage accounts and Linked Services in ADF (Azure Data Factory)
• Creating triggers for pipelines and scheduling the alerts
• Implementing SCD II concept in Stored Procedures
• Working on data validation to ensure for no data discrepancy between the Source and target

Engaging in Scrum meetings to acquire the requisites and furnish progress reports.Establishing Storage accounts and Linked Services within ADF (Azure Data Factory). • Formulating pipelines within ADF. • Developing stored procedures. • Crafting triggers for pipelines and orchestrating alert schedules. • Enforcing SCD II paradigm within Stored Procedures. • Conducting data validation to ensure congruence between the Source and target datasets.
